titleStmt.title: Poems on several occasions written by the Honoura ble Sir Robert Howard.
titleStmt.author: Howard, Robert, Sir, 1626-1698.
Virgil. Aeneis. Liber 6. English.
Statius, P. Papinius (Publius Papinius). Achilleis. English.
Dryden, John, 1631-1700.

notesStmt.note: Prefatory matter contains congratulatory poem to Howard by John Dryden.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
Poems (p. 1-27)--The blind lady : a comedy (p. 29-140)--The fourth book of Virgill (p. 141-169)--P. Papinius Statius his Achilleis (p. 171-282)--A panegyrick to Generall Monck (p. 283-285)
